content: @Brian Reinhold just making last minute checks for publication - can you check the publication review section at the top of https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/PHD/qa.html

Brian Reinhold just making last minute checks for publication - can you check the publication review section at the top of https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/PHD/qa.html

@Grahame Grieve I assume you mean these two items:

History Page 'history.html' is wrong (ig.json#paths/history) - must be 'http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/phd/history.html' or 'http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/phd/history.cfml'
package-list.json: file not found in /scratch/ig-build-temp-CTXASE/repo

If so, they are generated by the Framework. I will need to ask Lloyd how to make these modifications.

Brian Reinhold just making last minute checks for publication - can you check the publication review section at the top of https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/PHD/qa.html

@Grahame Grieve Made the package with help and info from David Pyke. Question, what should the version number be? The first two were 0.1.0 and 0.2.0. I assumed 0.3.0 and went with that. Should it be something else?
@Brian Reinhold PHD looks like it's all god except for ${ballotstatus} in the header - what's with that?

Brian Reinhold PHD looks like it's all god except for ${ballotstatus} in the header - what's with that?

I am at a loss ... I don't recall seeing that locally. I am at home now. I will try rebuilding it here locally. What is the source of that text?
build.xml? I didn't really follow what it was doing.... where did it come from?

build.xml? I didn't really follow what it was doing.... where did it come from?

Its also in the local build. The changes I made were the package-list.json and the update of an igToConfig.xslt

In fact, I got the xslt from David Pyke. I also got one from Lloyd and I just found they were different. I will try building with Lloyd's and see if that fixes it.

News flash ... it does not

@Lloyd McKenzie How am I getting this in the top row of the PHD IG header (above the red menu bar)?
PhdImplementationGuide 0.3.0 - ${ballotstatus}

THe only changes I made today were the update of the xslt and the addition of the package-list.json file.
It’s been there for a long time on the ci build

It’s been there for a long time on the ci build

Oh ... never noticed. Is it looking for some field to be placed in an xml that I did not put in? Not sure where the source of that 'PhdImplementationGuide' is ... there are lots of them!
ballotStatus should be coming from your ini file
You may have deleted the line because you weren't balloting, but you always need something there.
Take a look at SDC for an example of what to say.

Take a look at SDC for an example of what to say.

That may be the issue ... I don't have an ini file at all (there is one in src-generated but the contents of that are re-directs). There is a properties.txt file in /src which has suspicious items in it. It has no ballot or status entry but it has other entries like version, copyright, license, etc.. I can see I took that file directly from you genomics-reporting project (when I started this one) and changed the contents to match this guide. But I did not add or remove any entries.

Its the properties.txt file I need to add the ballot status line to. That fixed the issue.

It’s been there for a long time on the ci build

@Grahame Grieve Fixed it
